channel.items:
ALL SPORTS $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<item> <title>[makelist.param1] ( [makelist.param2] )</title> <link>$doregex[makelist2]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
span class="" >(.*?)<\/span>\n.*?\n\n.*?\n.*?;list=(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEgdi0XIXXZ-qJOFPf4JSKw
makelist2
<item> <title>[makelist2.param2]</title> <link>plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=[makelist2.param1]</link> <thumbnail></thumbnail>
dir="ltr" href="\/watch\?v=(.*?)".*?\n(.*?)\n https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=[makelist.param2]
/////////////////////////////
